page.title: 15OPINIONS OF MONYASH
page.content: {Results of questionnaire June 10th {1985: { 1)What do you think of Monyash today? 90% of the people like Monyash as it is.Many of these described the village as quiet and friendly with good community spirit.The 4% of people who do not like the village think it is too isolated. { 2) Are there any improvements which {you would like to see in the village? Alot of the replies were concerned with improvements to services and traffic in the village.45% want an improved bus service and 18% would like to see better traffic control. { 3) What do you think Monyash will be {like in 50 years time? 62% think that the village will not change much.Many of the people who expect changes refer to an increase in the number of holiday homes.
